text: March 21, 2018 / 2:49 PM / Updated 21 minutes ago ICC Cricket World Cup Qualifier 2018 Scoreboard Reuters Staff 3 Min Read Mar 21 (OPTA) - Scoreboard at close of play of super sixes match 7 between West Indies and Scotland on Wednesday at Harare, Zimbabwe West Indies win by 5 runs (DLS Method) West Indies 1st innings Chris Gayle c Matthew Cross b Safyaan Sharif 0 Evin Lewis lbw Brad Wheal 66 Shai Hope c Matthew Cross b Safyaan Sharif 0 Marlon Samuels c Tom Sole b Michael Leask 51 Shimron Hetmyer c Matthew Cross b Michael Leask 4 Jason Holder c Calum MacLeod b Alasdair Evans 12 Rovman Powell b Safyaan Sharif 15 Carlos Brathwaite c George Munsey b Brad Wheal 24 Ashley Nurse c Brad Wheal b Richard Berrington 5 Keemo Paul b Brad Wheal 5 Extras 0b 3lb 0nb 0pen 13w 16 Total (48.4 overs) 198 all out Fall of Wickets : 1-0 Gayle, 2-2 Hope, 3-123 Lewis, 4-135 Samuels, 5-135 Hetmyer, 6-158 Holder, 7-176 Powell, 8-184 Nurse, 9-198 Brathwaite, 10-198 Paul Did Not Bat : Roach Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Safyaan Sharif 9 1 27 3 3.00 Brad Wheal 9.4 0 34 3 3.52 5w Alasdair Evans 10 0 58 1 5.80 1w Tom Sole 7 0 28 0 4.00 3w Michael Leask 10 0 36 2 3.60 Richard Berrington 3 0 12 1 4.00 Scotland 1st innings Matthew Cross b Jason Holder 4 Kyle Coetzer c Evin Lewis b Kemar Roach 2 Michael Jones c Rovman Powell b Kemar Roach 14 Calum MacLeod c&b Ashley Nurse 21 Richard Berrington lbw Ashley Nurse 33 George Munsey Not Out 32 Michael Leask Not Out 14 Extras 0b 0lb 0nb 0pen 5w 5 Total (35.2 overs) 125-5 Fall of Wickets : 1-6 Coetzer, 2-12 Cross, 3-25 Jones, 4-67 MacLeod, 5-105 Berrington Did Not Bat : Sharif, Sole, Evans, Wheal Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Kemar Roach 7 2 20 2 2.86 1w Jason Holder 7 0 31 1 4.43 2w Keemo Paul 5 0 12 0 2.40 2w Carlos Brathwaite 7 2 27 0 3.86 Ashley Nurse 9.2 0 35 2 3.75 Umpire Paul Wilson Umpire Shaun George Video Simon Fry Match Referee Graeme Labrooy
